name: TwitterBot
body:
# TwitterBot - COMP 221 Algorithm Design/Analysis
## Team Members: Ayoub Belemlih, Connor Boyle, Andrew Cui

### Useful Resources

* Codecademy Twitter API intro: [https://www.codecademy.com/en/tracks/twitter](https://www.codecademy.com/en/tracks/twitter). Good introduction using Ruby.

* Tweepy: The python package we can use to retrieve tweets. The documentation has tips to install the package (using pip on your terminal) and basic code samples. [http://docs.tweepy.org/en/v3.5.0/](http://docs.tweepy.org/en/v3.5.0/)

* Use Tweepy to retrieve tweets from a specific account - Quora answer: [https://www.quora.com/How-can-I-retrieve-from-given-users-home_timeline-with-Tweepy](https://www.quora.com/How-can-I-retrieve-from-given-users-home_timeline-with-Tweepy)

Last Updated: 11/14/2016
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
